notes.title: Appreciation for My Girlfriend
notes.content: I am so grateful for everything you do. Your kindness, love, and support mean the world to me. I cherish every moment we spend together and look forward to creating more beautiful memories.

notes.title: Planning Our Trip to Europe
notes.content: We need to decide on the destinations we want to visit. Don't forget to check the travel restrictions and book our tickets early. Let's make a list of must-see places and local foods to try!

notes.title: Favorite Moments Together
content: Supporting each other during tough times

letter: You have a new love letter!
